name: Truck and Jeep Racing with Buddies
name_original: Truck and Jeep Racing with Buddies
description:
Drive the most adventurous trucks and jeeps in race to the top. Play with your friends. Use the powers to beat your opponents as you gain more points.

Main Features:
- 3 different game modes
- Powerboost, magnet power within game
- Incredible 5 off road vehicles to choose from
- GameCenter Leaderboards
